test-case.name: sf-insert-before-017

result.assert: /out = "true false false false true true true true false false true true true"

test-case.name: sf-insert-before-023

test-case.name: sf-insert-before-030
test-case.description: Streaming insert-before() - climbing operand, inspection usage
test-case.keywords: striding-then-climbing fn:name leading-lone-slash PathExpr positional-predicate SimpleMapExpr ancestor-axis

test-case.name: sf-insert-before-031
test-case.description: Streaming insert-before() - climbing operand, inspection usage, removal of duplicates
test-case.keywords: leading-lone-slash striding-then-climbing fn:name PathExpr SimpleMapExpr ancestor-axis

result.assert: /out = "BOOKLIST a b BOOKS ITEM ITEM ITEM ITEM ITEM ITEM"
